text: is a Japanese football player. She played for the Japan national team. ==Biography== Ogawa was born in Kashima on December 26, 1988. After graduating from high school, she joined JEF United Chiba in 2007. In 2010, she moved to INAC Kobe Leonessa. In 2012, she returned to JEF United Chiba. In 2014, she moved to Iga FC Kunoichi (later Iga FC Kunoichi Mie).Iga FC Kunoichi In March 2013, Ogawa was selected the Japan national team for 2013 Algarve Cup. At this competition, on March 6, she debuted against Norway. She played 3 games for Japan in 2013. ==Statistics== List of match in 2013 at Japan Football Association Japan national team Year Apps Goals 2013 3 0 Total 3 0 ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1988 births Category:Living people Category:Footballers from Ibaraki Prefecture Category:Japan women's international footballers Category:Nadeshiko League players Category:JEF United Chiba Ladies players Category:INAC Kobe Leonessa players Category:Iga FC Kunoichi Mie players
title: Shiho Ogawa
